parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Relevant options indicating how to save the document as defined in swSaveAsOptions_e

parameters.name: Errors
parameters.description: Errors that caused the save to fail as defined in swFileSaveError_e

parameters.name: Warnings
parameters.description: Warnings or extra information generated during the save operation as defined in swFileSaveWarning_e

title: IPartDoc.SaveToFile2
signature:
System.Boolean SaveToFile2( 
   System.String
Name
,
   System.Int32
Options
,
   out System.Int32
Errors
,
   out System.Int32
Warnings
)

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Relevant options indicating how to save the document as defined in swSaveAsOptions_e

parameters.name: Errors
parameters.description: Errors that caused the save to fail as defined in swFileSaveError_e

parameters.name: Warnings
parameters.description: Warnings or extra information generated during the save operation as defined in swFileSaveWarning_e

returns: True if the save is successful, false if not
